description: Manage Azure API Management Product's APIs.

commands.name: az apim product api add
commands.summary: Add an API to the specified product.
examples: az apim product api add --resource-group MyResourceGroup --service-name MyServiceName  --product-id MyProductID --api-id MyAPIID

commands.name: az apim product api check
commands.summary: Checks that API entity specified by identifier is associated with the Product entity.
examples: az apim product api check --resource-group MyResourceGroup  --service-name MyServiceName  --product-id MyProductID --api-id MyAPIID

commands.name: az apim product api delete
commands.summary: Deletes the specified API from the specified product.
examples: az apim product api delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --service-name MyServiceName  --product-id MyProductID --api-id MyAPIID

commands.name: az apim product api list
commands.summary: Lists a collection of the APIs associated with a product.
examples: az apim product api list --resource-group MyResourceGroup  --service-name MyServiceName  --product-id MyProductID
